name: The Red Wood
description:
"Cursed to see the deads, Golda must run from the ghost as they try to possess her for their own personal vendetta. All Golda wants is to find her mother, who disappeared, deep within the woods. But now Golda must battle not only the deads, but she has to stop something much... more... sinister."

Sequel of Red Grimly Tale

Inspired to ZodiacStories' fangame of Red Grimly Tale.

The Red Wood by fluffness
Character design by Monoyagi (Golda by ZodiacStories)
Sprites by Monoyagi
CG by Monoyagi
Story by fluffness and ZodiacStories
Development by fluffness
